msgid: \nPress OK on your remote control to continue.
\nScan for local extensions and install them.
openhdf: \n掃描本地套裝軟體並安裝它們。

msgid: \nView, install and remove available or installed packages.
openhdf: \n檢視, 安裝和刪除已安裝的套裝軟體。

msgid: * Only available if more than one interface is active.
openhdf: * 僅在一個或多個網卡啟動才有效.

msgid: A configuration file (%s) was modified since Installation.\nDo you want to keep your version?
openhdf: 配置檔(%s)在安裝後被修改了.\n是否想要保留您的版本？

msgid: A graphical EPG for all services of an specific bouquet
openhdf: 圖形EPG包含自定義組所有頻道

msgid: A recording is currently running.\nWhat do you want to do?
openhdf: 錄製正在進行中.\n您想做什麼?

msgid: A recording is currently running. Please stop the recording before trying to configure the positioner.
openhdf: 錄製正在進行中. 請在配置極軸之前停止錄製.

msgid: A required tool (%s) was not found.
openhdf: 一個必須的工具 (%s) 未找到.

msgid: A search for available updates is currently in progress.
A second configured interface has been found.\n\nDo you want to disable the second network interface?
openhdf: 發現第二個網路介面配置.\n\n您想禁用第二個網路介面?

msgid: A small overview of the available icon states and actions.
openhdf: 可用圖示狀態和動作的簡要概述.

msgid: A timer failed to record!\nDisable TV and try again?\n
openhdf: 定時錄影失敗.\n禁用電視輸出並重試?\n

msgid: Adjust the color settings so that all the color shades are distinguishable, but appear as saturated as possible. If you are happy with the result, press OK to close the video fine-tuning, or use the number keys to select other test screens.
openhdf: 調整顏色設定以使所有的顏色深淺可以辨識出來，使之看起來盡可能飽和。如果您對結果感到滿意，按OK關閉視頻微調，或者用數位鍵選擇畫面上的其他測驗。
一個空的檔案名是非法的.

msgid: Are you sure you want to activate this network configuration?\n\n
openhdf: 確定要啟動此網路配置？\n\n

msgid: Are you sure you want to exit this wizard?
Are you sure you want to restart your network interfaces?\n\n
openhdf: 您確定要重新啟動網路介面?\n\n
每隔? 分鐘自動分割.(0=從不)
按 0 鍵啟用畫中畫模式

msgid: Behavior when a movie is started
Behavior when a movie is stopped
Behavior when a movie reaches the end
Complex (allows mixing audio tracks and aspects)
openhdf: 複合 (允許混合音軌和相位)
配置功能變數名稱伺服器

Could not open Picture in Picture
Direct playback of linked titles without menu

msgid: Do you really want to check the filesystem?\nThis could take lots of time!
openhdf: 是否檢視檔系統?\n這將需要很長時間!

msgid: Do you really want to delete %s?
Do you really want to download\nthe plugin \"%s\"?
Do you really want to exit?
Do you really want to remove directory %s from the disk?
openhdf: 是否從磁片上刪除目錄%s ?

msgid: Do you really want to remove your bookmark of %s?
Do you want to burn this collection to DVD medium?
openhdf: 是否燒錄這個收藏到DVD光碟?

msgid: Do you want to do a service scan?
Do you want to do another manual service scan?
openhdf: 是否手動掃描其他頻道?

msgid: Do you want to install the package:\n
Do you want to play DVD in drive?
Do you want to preview this DVD before burning?
Do you want to remove the package:\n
Do you want to restore your settings?
Do you want to resume this playback?
Do you want to upgrade the package:\n
Don't stop current event but disable coming events
openhdf: 不能停止當前事件, 不過可以禁用下一個事件.
正在下載插件列表,請稍候...

msgid: Following tasks will be done after you press OK!
openhdf: 按下 OK 鍵後將完成以下任務!
正在下載插件資訊, 請稍候...

msgid: How many minutes do you want to record?
ISO file is too large for this filesystem!
If you see this, something is wrong with\nyour scart connection. Press OK to return.
openhdf: 如果您能看到這個提示,說明您的色差連接有錯誤.\n按OK返回.

msgid:
If your TV has a brightness or contrast enhancement, disable it. If there is something called "dynamic", set it to standard. Adjust the backlight level to a value suiting your taste. Turn down contrast on your TV as much as possible.
Then turn the brightness setting as low as possible, but make sure that the two lowermost shades of gray stay distinguishable.
Do not care about the bright shades now. They will be set up in the next step.
If you are happy with the result, press OK.
openhdf: 如果您的電視機有亮度或對比度增強項，請關閉它。如果裏面有標為“動態”的專案，將其設定為標準。調整背光等級的值以符合您的口味。將電視機的對比度盡可能地降低。然後盡可能將亮度設定調低，但請確保最下面的兩個灰色能夠分辨出來。現在，不必關心亮度的色調，它們將在接下來的步驟中設定。如果您對結果感到滿意，按OK 。

msgid: In order to record a timer, the TV was switched to the recording service!\n
openhdf: 定時錄製開始,即將切換到預錄頻道!\n

msgid: Install a new image with a USB stick
openhdf: 安裝一個新的韧體到U盤

msgid: Install a new image with your web browser
openhdf: 通過網頁流覽器安裝一個新的韧體

msgid: Linked titles with a DVD menu
openhdf: 與DVD功能表的連接的標題

msgid: Make this mark just a mark
Medium is not a writeable DVD!
NFI image flashing completed. Press Yellow to Reboot!
openhdf: NFI Image安裝完成.\n按黃鍵重啟Dreambox!

msgid: No HDD found or HDD not initialized!
openhdf: 未找到硬碟或硬碟未初始化！

msgid: No data on transponder!\n(Timeout reading PAT)
openhdf: 轉發器上未找到數據!\n(讀取PAT超時)

msgid: No details for this image file
openhdf: 這個韧體沒有詳細說明

msgid: No displayable files on this medium found!
openhdf: 在這個媒介上未發現檔!

msgid: No event info found, recording indefinitely.
openhdf: EPG資料沒有發現,無限制錄製.

msgid: No fast winding possible yet.. but you can use the number buttons to skip forward/backward!
openhdf: 結束還要一段時間.. 但您可以使用數位鍵 前進/後退!
未發現有支援的極軸天線.

msgid: No tuner is configured for use with a diseqc positioner!
No tuner is enabled!\nPlease setup your tuner settings before you start a service scan.
openhdf: 未找到可用的調諧器!\n請設定您的調諧器的設定，然後再啟動頻道掃描。.

msgid: No working local network adapter found.\nPlease verify that you have attached a network cable and your network is configured correctly.
openhdf: 未找到可用的本地網路.\n請檢視網路連接並檢視網卡配置是否正確.

msgid: No working wireless network adapter found.\nPlease verify that you have attached a compatible WLAN device and your network is configured correctly.
openhdf: 未找到可用的無線網路連接.\n請檢視無線網路裝置並檢視無線網卡配置是否正確.

msgid: No working wireless network interface found.\n Please verify that you have attached a compatible WLAN device or enable your local network interface.
openhdf: 未找到可用的無線網卡.\n請確認您已連接相容的無線網卡或使用本地網卡.
否, 重新開始播放這個視頻

msgid: Nothing to scan!\nPlease setup your tuner settings before you start a service scan.
openhdf: 沒有掃描!\n請設定您的調諧器，然後再啟動頻道掃描。.

msgid: Now, use the contrast setting to turn up the brightness of the background as much as possible, but make sure that you can still see the difference between the two brightest levels of shades.If you have done that, press OK.
openhdf: 現在，盡可能使用對比度設定出現的亮度背景，但是請確保您仍然可以看到色調的兩個最亮等級之間的不同。如果您已經完成了，按OK。

msgid: OK, guide me through the upgrade process
openhdf: OK, 引導我的升級過程

msgid: Please add titles to the compilation.
Please configure or verify your Nameservers by filling out the required values.\nWhen you are ready press OK to continue.
openhdf: 請設定或核實填寫您的功能變數名稱伺服器.\n準備好後按OK繼續.

msgid: Please configure your internet connection by filling out the required values.\nWhen you are ready press OK to continue.
openhdf: 下列數值必須設定正確才能連接到Internet.\n當您準備好後按OK鍵確認.

msgid: Please do not change any values unless you know what you are doing!
openhdf: 不要做任何改變,除非您知道您在幹什麼!

msgid: Please enter a name for the new bouquet
Please enter a name for the new marker

openhdf: 請輸入一個新的檔案名

msgid: Please enter filename (empty = use current date)
openhdf: 請輸入檔案名 (空=使用當時日期命名)

msgid: Please enter name of the new directory
Please enter the correct pin code
Please follow the instructions on the TV
openhdf: 請依照電視螢幕指導操作.

msgid: Please note that the previously selected media could not be accessed and therefore the default directory is being used instead.
openhdf: 請注意的是之前選擇的媒體不能訪問,預設的目錄已被替換.

msgid: Please select a playlist to delete...
openhdf: 請選擇要刪除的播放列表...

msgid: Please select a subservice to record...
Please select medium to use as backup location
openhdf: 請選擇作為備份的媒介

msgid: Please select the network interface that you want to use for your internet connection.\n\nPlease press OK to continue.
openhdf: 請選擇連接Internet的網路裝置.\n\n按OK鍵確認.

msgid: Please select the wireless network that you want to connect to.\n\nPlease press OK to continue.
openhdf: 請選擇您要接入的無線網路.\n\n按OK鍵確認

msgid: Please use direction keys to move the PiP window.\nPress Bouquet +/- to resize the window.\nPress OK to go back to the TV mode or EXIT to cancel the moving.
openhdf: 請使用方向鍵移動畫中畫視窗.\n按遙控器上 Bouquet +/- 改變視窗大小..\n按OK返回到電視模式，或按EXIT取消調整。

msgid: Please use the UP and DOWN keys to select your language. Afterwards press the OK button.
openhdf: 按 上/下 鍵選擇語言, 選定後按 OK.

msgid: Please wait for activation of your network configuration...
Please wait while scanning is in progress...
Please wait while we configure your network...
Please wait while we prepare your network interfaces...
openhdf: 請稍候,我們正在準備您的網路介面...

msgid: Please wait while we test your network...
openhdf: 請稍候,我們正在測驗您的網路...

openhdf: 正在載入列表... 請稍候...

msgid: Press OK on your remote control to continue.
Press OK to activate the selected skin.
Press OK to activate the settings.
Press OK to edit the settings.

msgid: Press OK to select/deselect a CAId.
openhdf: 按 OK 選擇/取消 CAId.

msgid: Press OK to start the scan
Press OK to toggle the selection.
Press yellow to set this interface as default interface.

openhdf: 錄製正在進行中或剛開始錄製不久!
刪除 %s 目錄失敗. (很可能不是空目錄.)

msgid: Repeating event currently recording... What do you want to do?
openhdf: 重複的定時錄製事件...\n您準備怎麼辦?

openhdf: 重置視頻增強設定為預設設定?

Searching for available updates. Please wait...

Stop testing plane after # successful transponders

%s

The sleep timer has been disabled.
The timer file (timers.xml) is corrupt and could not be loaded.

msgid: The wireless LAN plugin is not installed!\nPlease install it and choose what you want to do next.
openhdf: 無線網路插件未安裝!\n請安裝並選擇下一步做什麼.

msgid: The wireless LAN plugin is not installed!\nPlease install it.
The wizard can backup your current settings. Do you want to do a backup now?

msgid: There are currently no outstanding actions.
There might not be enough Space on the selected Partition.\nDo you really want to continue?
openhdf: 所選的分區上可能沒有足夠的空間.\n是否繼續？

msgid: This DVD RW medium is already formatted - reformatting will erase all content on the disc.
openhdf: 這張DVD RW已經格式化過，再次格式化將刪除所有檔

openhdf: 測驗timers.xml有重疊部分！\n請重新檢視它!

msgid: Try to find used transponders in cable network.. please wait...
openhdf: 嘗試從電纜找尋可用的轉發器.. 請稍候...

msgid: Trying to download a new packetlist. Please wait...
openhdf: 嘗試下載新的套裝軟體列表. 請稍候...

msgid: Use the up/down keys on your remote control to select an option. After that, press OK.
openhdf: 使用遙控 上/下 鍵選擇一個選項。在此之後按下 OK 。

msgid: View list of available CommonInterface extensions
openhdf: 檢視可用的CI通用介面列表.

msgid: View list of available EPG extensions.
View list of available communication extensions.

msgid: View list of available networking extensions
View list of available recording extensions
View list of available software extensions

msgid: What do you want to scan?

When you do a factory reset, you will lose ALL your configuration data
(including bouquets, services, satellite data ...)
After completion of factory reset, your receiver will restart automatically!

Really do a factory reset?
openhdf:
如果恢復出廠設定，全部個人設定將丟失
(包括衛星, 頻道, 自定義組等 ...)
完成出廠設定復位後, 接收機將自動重啟!

確定要恢復出廠設定嗎?

msgid: Where do you want to backup your settings?
Where to save temporary timeshift recordings?
openhdf: 在哪里保存時光平移臨時錄製的內容?

msgid: Write error while recording. Disk full?\n
openhdf: 錄製節目時出現錯誤.磁片已滿?\n

msgid: Yes, do a manual scan now
Yes, do an automatic scan now
Yes, do another manual scan now
openhdf: 是，手動掃描另一個參數

msgid: You have chosen to backup your settings. Please press OK to start the backup now.
openhdf: 您已選擇要備份您的設定。請按OK鍵開始備份。

msgid: You have chosen to create a new .NFI flasher bootable USB stick. This will repartition the USB stick and therefore all data on it will be erased.
openhdf: 您已經選擇創建一個新的用於安裝.NFI的啟動U盤,這將重新對U盤進行格式化,所有資料將被刪除.

msgid: You have chosen to restore your settings. Enigma2 will restart after restore. Please press OK to start the restore now.
openhdf: 您已經選擇恢復備份設定.恢復後將重啟Enigma2.請按OK開始恢復備份.

msgid: Your backup succeeded. We will now continue to explain the further upgrade process.
openhdf: 備份成功.現在將繼續說明下一步的升級過程.

msgid: Your collection exceeds the size of a single layer medium, you will need a blank dual layer DVD!
openhdf: 您的收藏超過單層DVD大小,您將需要一個空白雙層DVD！！！

msgid: Your current collection will get lost!
Your frontprocessor firmware must be upgraded.\nPress OK to start upgrade.
openhdf: 您的前端處理器韧體必須更新.\n按 OK 開始升級.

msgid: Your internet connection is not working!\nPlease choose what you want to do next.
openhdf: Internet連接不正常！\n請選擇下一步做什麼

msgid: Your network configuration has been activated.
openhdf: 您的網路配置已被啟動.

msgid:
Your wireless LAN internet connection could not be started!
Have you attached your USB WLAN Stick?

Please choose what you want to do next.
openhdf:
無線網路不能連接！
是否連接了USB無線網卡?

請選擇下一步做什麼.

msgid: Zap back to service before positioner setup?
openhdf: 切換回設定位置之前的頻道?

msgid: Zap back to service before tuner setup?
openhdf: 切換回調諧器配置之前的頻道?

a gui to assign services/providers/caids to common interface modules

jump forward to the next title

向上移動到第一個項目
向上移動到上一個項目

of a SINGLE layer medium used.
